short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks website credibility and suggests related articles from more credible sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Is someone tweet at you something you think is fake news? Maybe you are reading something on the internet that doesn't seem quite right? Worry no further! This extension (in beta) will notify you when you might be browsing a fake website on the internet and we will notify you and even present you with similar articles of high trustworthiness.
